DOC.brief_summary: Prospective registry patient severe isolate tricuspid regurgitation ( TR ) without significant left-sided valvular myocardial disease . Aim : To evaluate clinical course prognostic factor patient severe isolate TR .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Registry Patients With Isolated Severe Tricuspid Regurgitation
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion Severe isolate TR 6 month Exclusion criteria 1 . Severe mitral aortic valvular heart disease 2 . Age equal 75 year 3 . Malignancy serious comorbidity life expectancy < 5years 4 . Acute subacute infective endocarditis require antibiotic therapy 5 . Untreated hyperthyroidism 6 . Constrictive pericarditis 7 . Unclosed significant atrial septal defect 8 . Previous tricuspid valve surgery 9 . Significant coronary artery disease 10 . Cardiomyopathy 11 . Pregnancy 12 . Severe rest pulmonary hypertension ( TR Vmax > 4.0 m/s )
